title: Marsh McLennan’s Secure Harbor Targets Senior Living Risk And Returns
summary: Marsh McLennan Agency has launched Secure Harbor, a group captive insurance solution tailored for senior living communities. The product is designed to address access to liability coverage in an increasingly difficult insurance market for senior care operators. Secure Harbor focuses on pooling risk for qualified participants, with an emphasis on long term coverage stability and risk management support.
